column2: Poolparty @Verona with ESN Trento

column6:
Dear all,
ESN Trento together with ESN Verona are happy to invite you to an incredible and really unique POOL PARTY!!!!

Don’t miss the chance to relax and have fun together with more than 450 Erasmus students coming from different Italian cities.

At 6 p.m. (don’t be late!!!) the bus will leave from Trento bringing all the participants to Verona Village where a real pool party will start. There you will meet our DJs ready to make you dance to the rhythms of the best modern music, also there's an "all-you-can-eat" buffet (hot dogs, hamburgers, french fries and pizza), "all-you-can-drink" beer, 3 cocktails, solarium and a Jacuzzi until midnight.
Some time later, just as in Cinderella, after getting changed and ready in the changing rooms, we will move to the ‘’night-time’’ part of the Village, where we will have a private room just for us and our DJs who will definitely make you party till the next morning. Besides, there are 3 more discotheques within the building among which you can choose one you like best according to your personal music preferences (Latin-American, Brazilian dance xiqueira or commercial music). Still we definitely recommend the party with our DJs, so we can all have fun and one crazy party together
